Name: inst
Notes: 100 < inst < 200 is used for original ALFAM data, 200 < x is used for new data.

Name: database
Notes: 1 for original ALFAM data, 2 for new data

Name: row.in.file
Description: Location of observation in data file (completed template)

Name: t.start.orig
Description: Date/time of measurement interval start (as entered in template)

Name: t.end.orig
Description: Date/time of measurement interval end (as entered in template)

Name: ct
Description: Time since application (c for cumulative) based on reported interval duration (assumes first interval started at time of application)

Name: cta
Description: Time since application (c for cumulative) based on reported interval date/time and application date/time if available

Name: j.NH3
Description: Average emission flux of NH3 in measurement interval

Name: j.rel
Description: Average relative emission flux of NH3 in measurement interval
Units: fraction of applied TAN per h

Name: e.cum
Description: Cumulative NH3 emission to the end of measurement interval

Name: e.rel
Description: Cumulative relative NH3 emission to the end of measurement interval

Name: wind
Description: Average wind speed over first 6 h

Name: wind.1m
Description: Average adjusted wind speed over first 6 h
Notes: Wind speed estimated at 1 m height

Name: rain.cum
Description: Total cumulative rainfall to end of interval

Name: man.source.orig
Description: Source of manure (as entered in template)

Name: man.tan
Units: g/kg as N, wet mass basis

Name: man.tic
Units: g/kg as C, wet mass basis

Name: man.freeNH3
Notes: Calculated from air temperature, pH, and TAN

Name: man.eq.gasNH3
Notes: Calculated from air temperature, pH, and TAN

Name: crop.orig
Description: Crop present in field (as entered in template)
